text.0: forth from the mortar is the juice sent like a carhorse to the sieve.
text.1: the steed steps forward to the goal.
text.2: thus soma watchful bearing well cheering the gods flow past the sieve.
text.3: turned to the vat that drops with meath.
text.4: excellent pavamana make the lights shine brightly out for us.
text.5: speed us to mental power and skill.
text.6: he beautified by pious men and coming from their hands adorned.
text.8: may soma pour all treasures of the heavens the earth the firmament.
text.10: thou mountest to the height of heaven o soma seeking steeds and kine.
text.11: and seeking heroes lord of strength.
